channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15772] Remove the 'Path ... should be specified as a URI' warnings on startup
item.description:
The following warnings are logged on service startup and are noise. It is perfectly valid to list local paths without using the URI syntax.

2018-09-16 23:16:11,393 WARN  common.Util (Util.java:stringAsURI(99)) - Path /hadoop/hdfs/namenode should be specified as a URI in configuration files. Please update hdfs configuration.
item.summary: Remove the 'Path ... should be specified as a URI' warnings on startup

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Thanks for picking this up ayushtkn. It may be a good idea to leave an info message in place, something like:

Assuming 'file' scheme for path /hadoop/hdfs/namenode in configuration.

I'll leave this jira open for a couple of days in case others have comments. The message has been there for a long time.

-1 overall
